body_html: Seems like an authorization issue rather TensorFlow's. Your user is probably not authorized to access a directory necessary for the installation. Using sudo will work but be sure you know what you're doing.
body_text: Seems like an authorization issue rather TensorFlow's. Your user is probably not authorized to access a directory necessary for the installation. Using sudo will work but be sure you know what you're doing.
body: Seems like an authorization issue rather TensorFlow's. Your user is probably not authorized to access a directory necessary for the installation. Using `sudo` will work but be sure you know what you're doing.
